snippet: The fast-food giant is opening its first restaurant in the country, which some see as one of Asia’s last consumer markets with significant untapped potential.
abstract: McDonald's is opening its first restaurant in Vietnam, which some see as one of Asia's last consumer markets with significant untapped potential for growth; Vietnam has surging middle class, and most of its 90 million citizens were born after the Vietnam War ended in 1975, opening door for many young Vietnamese who are insatiably curious about foreign cuisine and culture.
lead_paragraph: The fast-food giant is opening its first restaurant in the country, which some see as one of Asia’s last consumer markets with significant untapped potential.

headline.main: McDonald’s Opens in Vietnam, Bringing Big Mac to Fans of Banh Mi
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Opens in Vietnam, Bringing Big Mac to Fans of Banh Mi
